name: Hard Fractured Beatle Songs Quiz / Test | Beatles, The | 15 Questions

questions.explanation:
Eleanor Rigby.

	All the lonely people, where do they all come from?

questions.text: Loose sea under guy width dire mints?
questions.correct: Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds
questions.explanation:
Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds.

	Suddenly someone is there at the turnstile, the girl with kaleidoscope eyes.

Yellow Submarine.

	In the town where I was born lived a man who sailed the sea. And he told us of his life in the land of submarines.

questions.correct: I Wanna Hold Your Hand & I Want to Hold Your Hand
questions.explanation:
I Wanna Hold Your Hand & I Want to Hold Your Hand.

	I wanna tell you something. I think you'll understand when I say that something: I wanna hold your hand.

Maxwells Silver Hammer.

	Bang, bang, Maxwell's silver hammer came down upon her head! Bang, bang, Maxwell's silver hammer made sure that she was dead!

questions.correct: Why Dont We Do It in the Road
questions.explanation:
Why Dont We Do It in the Road.

	No one will be watching us.

Yesterday.

	Yesterday all my troubles seemed so far away. Now it looks as though they're here to stay. Oh, I believe in yesterday.

Norwegian Wood.

	She showed me her room. "Isn't it good Norwegian wood?"

questions.correct: Eight Days a Week & 8 Days a Week
questions.explanation:
Eight Days a Week & 8 Days a Week.

	Ooo I need your love, babe. Guess you know it's true. Hope you need my love, babe, just like I need you.

questions.correct: Im Looking Through You & Im Lookin Through You
questions.explanation:
Im Looking Through You & Im Lookin Through You.

	Why, tell me why did you not treat me right? Love has a nasty habit of disappearing overnight.

Hey Jude.

	Take a sad song and make it better.

Come Together.

	Here come ol' Flat-top, he come groovin' up slowly.

Day Tripper.

	It took me sooooo-oh-oh long to find out, but I found out.

The Long and Winding Road.

	Don't leave me waiting here. Lead me to your door.

Good Day Sunshine.

	I need to laugh, but when the sun is out I've got something I can laugh about. I feel good in a special way. I'm in love and it's a sunny day!
